perturbation.original_text: Each Party irrevocably consents to the exclusive jurisdiction, forum and venue of any state or federal court sitting in New York City in the State of New York over any and all claims, disputes, controversies or disagreements between the Parties or any of their respective Affiliates, successors and assigns under or related to this Agreement or any of the transactions contemplated hereby, including their execution, performance or enforcement, whether in contract, tort or otherwise. Each of the Parties hereby agrees that it shall not assert and shall hereby waive any claim or right or defense that it is not subject to the jurisdiction of such courts, that the venue is improper, that the forum is inconvenient or any similar objection, claim or argument. Each Party agrees that a final judgment in any legal proceeding resolved in accordance with this Section 11.03, Section 11.04, Section 11.05 and Section 11.06 shall be conclusive and may be enforced in other jurisdictions by suit on the judgment or in any other manner provided by applicable Law.
perturbation.changed_text: Each Party consents to the jurisdiction, forum and venue of any court sitting in New York over any and all claims, disputes, controversies or disagreements between the Parties under or related to this Agreement. Each Party agrees that a judgment in any legal proceeding resolved in accordance with this Section 11.03 shall be conclusive and may be enforced in other jurisdictions.
perturbation.explanation: The removal of 'irrevocably', 'exclusive', 'state or federal court sitting in New York City in the State of New York', 'respective Affiliates, successors and assigns under or related to this Agreement or any of the transactions contemplated hereby, including their execution, performance or enforcement, whether in contract, tort or otherwise', 'Each of the Parties hereby agrees that it shall not assert and shall hereby waive any claim or right or defense that it is not subject to the jurisdiction of such courts, that the venue is improper, that the forum is inconvenient or any similar objection, claim or argument', and 'or in any other manner provided by applicable Law' significantly weakens the jurisdiction clause. By removing irrevocably and exclusive jurisdiction, there is a legal contradiction where both parties can claim jurisdiction to other states.
perturbation.contradicted_law: New York General Obligations Law ยง 5-1402, which permits parties to agree to New York jurisdiction in certain contracts exceeding a specified value if they agree to submit to such jurisdiction

perturbation.original_text: EACH PARTY HEREBY WAIVES ITS RIGHTS TO A JURY TRIAL OF ANY CLAIM OR CAUSE OF ACTION BASED UPON, ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO THIS AGREEMENT OR THE TRANSACTIONS CONTEMPLATED HEREBY, INCLUDING THEIR EXECUTION, PERFORMANCE OR ENFORCEMENT, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE. THE SCOPE OF THIS WAIVER IS INTENDED TO BE ALL-ENCOMPASSING OF ANY AND ALL DISPUTES THAT MAY BE FILED IN ANY COURT AND THAT RELATE TO THE SUBJECT MATTER OF THIS TRANSACTION, INCLUDING CONTRACT CLAIMS, TORT CLAIMS (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE), BREACH OF DUTY CLAIMS AND ALL OTHER COMMON LAW AND STATUTORY CLAIMS. THIS SECTION HAS BEEN FULLY DISCUSSED BY EACH OF THE PARTIES AND THESE PROVISIONS WILL NOT BE SUBJECT TO ANY EXCEPTIONS.
perturbation.changed_text: Each party waives its rights to a jury trial of any claim related to this agreement.
perturbation.explanation: By omitting the explicit statement that 'THIS SECTION HAS BEEN FULLY DISCUSSED BY EACH OF THE PARTIES AND THESE PROVISIONS WILL NOT BE SUBJECT TO ANY EXCEPTIONS.' This omission is significant because the enforceability of jury waivers is often dependent on demonstrating that the waiver was knowing, voluntary, and intelligent. By removing the clear assertion of full discussion, the enforceability of the waiver becomes questionable, introducing legal risk. It is a legal contradiction because not all parties have the capacity to give a valid jury trial, hence should go to trial by judge.
perturbation.contradicted_law: New York Civil Practice Law and Rules (CPLR) ยง 4102(c) - Jury trial waiver must be knowing and voluntary

perturbation.original_text: Subject to Section 11.02 and Section 11.05, in the event of any actual or threatened default in, or breach of, any of the terms, conditions and provisions of this Agreement, the affected Party shall have the right to specific performance and injunctive or other equitable relief of its rights under this Agreement, in addition to any and all other rights and remedies at Law or in equity, and all such rights and remedies shall be cumulative. The other Party shall not oppose the granting of such relief on the basis that money damages are an adequate remedy. The Parties agree that the remedies at Law for any breach or threatened breach hereof, including monetary damages, are inadequate compensation for any loss and that any defense in any action for specific performance that a remedy at Law would be adequate is waived. Any requirements for the securing or posting of any bond with such remedy are waived.
perturbation.changed_text: In the event of any default in, or breach of, any of the terms and conditions of this Agreement, the affected Party shall have the right to seek specific performance and injunctive or other equitable relief. The other Party shall not oppose the granting of such relief.
perturbation.explanation: By removing 'Subject to Section 11.02 and Section 11.05', 'all other rights and remedies at Law or in equity, and all such rights and remedies shall be cumulative', 'on the basis that money damages are an adequate remedy', 'The Parties agree that the remedies at Law for any breach or threatened breach hereof, including monetary damages, are inadequate compensation for any loss and that any defense in any action for specific performance that a remedy at Law would be adequate is waived' and 'Any requirements for the securing or posting of any bond with such remedy are waived.', the amended clause significantly weakens the rights of the affected party to pursue specific performance. In particular, by removing the waiver of the argument that money damages are adequate, the other party can raise this defense, making it harder to obtain specific performance. It creates a legal contradiction because in NY, specific performance is not typically granted if monetary damages would be enough to compensate the claimant.
perturbation.contradicted_law: New York law regarding specific performance, which requires a showing that monetary damages are inadequate to compensate for the breach
